text: Mata mūsā ga sono min no tame ni, mizu o motomete inotta toki o omoiokose. Ware wa,`anata no tsue de iwa o ute.' To itta. Suruto soko kara, 12 no izumi ga waki dete, kaku shizoku wa, jibun no mizuba o shitta. `Arrā kara sazukatta kate o, tabe katsu nomi nasai. Daraku shite, chijō de aku o okonatte wa naranai
